org.openmuc.jmbus.transportlayer

Class Builder<C,B extends Builder<C,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmuc.jmbus.transportlayer.Builder<C,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the resulting connection after calling build().
    B - the inheriting builder type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SerialBuilder, TcpBuilder

    public abstract class Builder<C,B extends Builder<C,B>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A abstract builder to an active M-Bus connection.

      • setTimeout

        public B setTimeout(int timeout)
        Set the connection timeout. The timeout must be ≥ zero. A timeout of zero is interpreted as infinite timeout,
        Parameters:
        timeout - a timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the builder itself.

        Build the TransportLayer with the given settings.

      • build

        public abstract C build()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This return an active M-Bus connection.
        Returns:
        a new active M-Bus connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception occurred opening the connection to the remote device.
